d:
Play for free at PotionsAwry.com

Web game, plays on mobile. If your device can't handle the game, use this link instead:

https://potionsawry.com/?compatible

Art by the legendary mamabliss of old. This is just a teaser of things to come!

If you want to get updates for when more characters get added to the game, join my patreon as a FREE member and get notified whenever my games get an update!

https://www.patreon.com/cw/smuttygames
